thread.title: Holiday inn time square over spring break
thread.title_full: Holiday inn time square over spring break - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gkipp
title: Holiday inn time square over spring break
text: Great stay 3/2-315. Nice micro hotel. Rooms are tiny but well done. Great location. Staff very friendly and helpful. Beds are confee. Can walk to several locations in 10-20 minutes. Would stay again. There is a pizza by the slice next door and a donut shop across the street.
